title: Mikel Arteta - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2018, Arteta became strongly linked with the Arsenal manager's vacancy, following the departure of his former manager Arsène Wenger, but Unai Emery was eventually hired. On 20 December 2019, Arteta was appointed head coach at his former club Arsenal, signing a deal until 2023.

title: Mikel Arteta joining as our new head coach | Club announcement | News | Arsenal.com
snippet: We're delighted to announce Mikel Arteta is joining the club as our head coach on Sunday.

title: Arsenal Coaching Staff | Team Behind the Team
snippet: Arsenal’s coaching staff for the 2025/26 season under Mikel Arteta is a close-knit group.

title: Mikel Arteta appointed Arsenal head coach | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Arsenal have appointed Mikel Arteta as their new head coach on a three-and-a-half-year deal.

title: Mikel Arteta: Arsenal appoint ex-captain as head coach - BBC Sport
snippet: Arsenal have appointed their former captain Mikel Arteta as head coach on a three-and-a-half-year deal.
